name: Apparata.nl Dark Theme (obsolete now)
description: Dark Theme for www.apparata.nl. For the best experience, please also use the autoblog.nl and autojunk.nl Dark Themes, as all the websites are part of the same network and deeplink eachother articles on the front page.
additional_info:
• Dark backgrounds for less eye-strain
• Consistent experience when using the autoblog.nl and autojunk.nl dark themes
